description.value:
A shaman who selects the flame spirit has a radiant light behind her eyes and the faint smell of smoke about her. When she calls upon one of this spirit’s abilities, a hungry spectral flame dances around her body.

Spirit Magic Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lndeaqm2j2nvgm6p]{Burning Hands} (1st),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tkjnm3lw7ni82tag]{Resist Energy} (2nd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6oq1wcryviik9ice]{Fireball} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.92hth51cs9oi0nfe]{Wall Of Fire} (4th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.hd7ukybisvv7j5r6]{Summon Monster V} (fire elementals only) (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0hknfnoaljc75fj3]{Fire Seeds} (6th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9wl8ijy6argdvz5f]{Fire Storm} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.iq0as5470o8q9y39]{Incendiary Cloud} (8th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qk3oeq4awbc1smjw]{Fiery Body} (9th)

Spirit Animal: The shaman’s spirit animal is surrounded by a nimbus of flame that gives off light like a candle. This nimbus is warm to the touch, but doesn’t cause any damage. The animal is immune to fire damage, but is vulnerable to cold damage (Bestiary 305).
